name: RFQ Invitation - Initial
body:
Hello [Supplier Name],

We would like to invite you to participate in the RFQ for [Project Name]. Please review the documents and confirm your intent to bid.

Regards,
[Your Name]

name: Intent to Bid - Reminder
body:
Hello [Supplier Name],

This is a gentle reminder to share your Intent to Bid for the RFQ [RFQ Number]. Kindly confirm your interest so we can proceed with the next steps.

Thank you,
[Your Name]

name: Bid Submission Reminder
body:
Hello [Supplier Name],

Friendly reminder that the bid submission for [Project Name] is due on [Bid Due Date]. Please ensure your documents are uploaded before the deadline.

Regards,
[Your Name]

name: Missing Documents Request
body:
Hello [Supplier Name],

We noticed that the following documents are pending:
- [Document 1]
- [Document 2]

Kindly share the required files to avoid delays.

Thanks,
[Your Name]

name: Additional Information Needed
body:
Hello [Supplier Name],

We require additional information regarding [Topic]. Please provide details so we can continue the onboarding process.

Thanks,
[Your Name]

name: Internal Update to Requestor
body:
Hi [Requester Name],

We have reached out to the supplier regarding [Topic]. We will update you once we receive a response.

Regards,
[Your Name]

name: Case Update - Waiting on Vendor
body:
Hi [Requester Name],

We are currently awaiting a response from the supplier. We will follow up again if there is no update.

Regards,
[Your Name]

name: Issue Resolved - Closure Note
body:
Hi [Requester Name],

The issue has been resolved and the necessary actions are complete. Please review and let us know if any further support is needed.

Regards,
[Your Name]
